verses.roman:
bhūmite paḍi' āche prabhu dīrgha saba kāya
jale śveta-tanu, vālu lāgiyāche gāya

synonyms: bhūmite—on the ground; paḍi'-lying; āche—was; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; dīrgha—elongated; saba kāya—the whole body; jale—by the water; śveta-tanu—white body; vālu—sand; lāgiyāche gāya—was smeared over the body.
translation: The Lord was lying on the ground, His body elongated and bleached white by the water. He was covered from head to foot with sand.
